alert.note: Alert for Des Moines (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Des Moines County through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mediapolis, or 13 miles east of Mount Pleasant, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could break small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mediapolis, Kossuth, Big Hollow Recreation Area, Pleasant Grove, Dodgeville, Yarmouth, Starr`s Cave Park and Preserve and Sperry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
